divs: Sighting Detailsmy Father was in the bathroom and he noticed something in the soap holder, he looked closer and he found a odd shaped object that was stuck on the soap. it appeared dead and so my father put it in a little baggie. after some researching it has a striking resemblance to RODS.
Summary: may have physical evidence of RODS
